timeline.message: Move Springer API key to secrets

Revert "Run SpringerFetcherTests to verify functionality"

This reverts commit 31195ef1

timeline.bodyText: Just out of interest: I thought it Java convention to always hide fields with getters. In which cases is it ok to have public variables?
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText: It used to be a convention which was even more manifested due to libraries depending on the existence on getters/setters. In such a case with immutable variables, adding public getters is just useless since you are not hiding anything.
replies.author: LinusDietz
